import{useState,useEffect}from'react';export const useZoomDetection=()=>{const[zoomLevel,setZoomLevel]=useState(1);const[isZoomed,setIsZoomed]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const updateZoom=()=>{const zoom=window.devicePixelRatio||1;const viewportWidth=window.innerWidth;const screenWidth=window.screen.width;// Detect if zoomed
const zoomed=viewportWidth<screenWidth*0.9;setZoomLevel(zoom);setIsZoomed(zoomed);// Add class to body for CSS targeting
if(zoomed){document.body.classList.add('zoomed');}else{document.body.classList.remove('zoomed');}};// Initial check
updateZoom();// Listen for resize events
window.addEventListener('resize',updateZoom);window.addEventListener('orientationchange',updateZoom);return()=>{window.removeEventListener('resize',updateZoom);window.removeEventListener('orientationchange',updateZoom);};},[]);return{zoomLevel,isZoomed};};
